QuestData.Title: Down Into Nazjatar
QuestData.Description:
We have much to do $n. However our troops are weary and need rest. Decisions made when tired are often the wrong ones.
These "Unshackled" have offered to aid us with what forces they have. If we hope to survive down here against Azshara's forces, we will need to support our new allies.
Join one of their hunters and aid them in their tasks, we will remain here and discuss our next move.
QuestData.LogDescription: Support your allies in Nazjatar by getting one to rank 3.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Lor'themar Theron in Nazjatar.

Objectives.Objective: Reach rank 3 with an Unshackled ally
